TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted.

Establishing the communication.

Spoiler

 

I wish ewoks were undersized chewbaccas.

Granted, but to keep balance in the force the Wookies (Chewbacca) or oversized Ewoks which resulted in Chewie not being able to save Yoda thus Luke Skywalker was never trained to use the force. ALL HAIL THE EMPIRE!

 

I wish to see real alien technology.

Granted. Now all technology is Alien to you.

I wish to understand that which I do not.

Granted now you do not understand that which you do.

 

I wish to see how KSP2 actually plays at this moment.

Granted.
Darts, ping-pong, sometimes bowling,

I wish all KSP mods (modifications) got upgraded to 1.12

Granted. Afterwards 1.12 final bugfix is released making all previous mods not work.

 

I wish for teleportation similar to science fiction but works.

A large modders convention is called, and enthusiasts from all over the globe come together thanks to their mutual love of KSP and the community. At the keynote address, linuxgurugamer holds a stirring lecture about the power of community and the importance of unity. He encourages all modders to keep their work up to date with the last version of KSP for the good of the community and spaceflight enthusiasts alike. Those in the audience are moved to tears by his emphatic presentation and all vow to start work immediately on one final update before retirement upon returning home. Unfortunately for kerbiloid, one little typo causes all mods to be reverted to 1.1.2.

I wish I didn't just get ninja'd by Dientus as I was proofreading that.

Granted. You are shaolin'ed instead.

4 minutes ago, Dientus said:

I wish for teleportation similar to science fiction but works.

Granted. It randomly fails every second time.

2 minutes ago, Deddly said:

and the importance of unity

Unity is everything for KSP. It's coded in Unity.

I wish 1.1.2 was upgraded to 1.12.

Granted. Your PC explodes while upgrading it.

I wish for a GE CF6 in my backyard

Granted. Now you should pay for taking it away, and explain to the police where it had come from.

I wish the wish thread worked.

Granted. I say it doesn't.

I wish for all the Calvin and Hobbes collection books.

Granted. But there is a mistake and you get Calvin and Garfield instead.

I wish that I could still play all my games but have them look as pretty as the pics Lemon Cup put up in WDYDIKSPT.

Stormpilot suddenly receives an unexpected delivery: every single Calvin and Hobbes book that was ever printed. Truck after truck line up on the street to unload the many thousands of books. @AlamoVampire also turns up to demand information about what is going on.

I wish for a forum that worked properly on mobile phones.

Granted but its the megathread

I wish for a new matt lowne video

Granted.

Wait until Saturday.

I wish for a new Stratzemblitz75 video today

Granted but its in 2x2 resolution and there is no audio!

I wish to know why stormpilot got those books!

105207272021

Uhhhh…. Because he want to read them. For some reason you become blind. 
I wish to know what the heck is going on???

Granted. Now you know what is going on, but nobody else does resulting in what still looks like a long message line of incoherent babble to you.

 

I wish to feel better

Granted. But you are now in the same condition as tom hanks character from “The Green Mile.”

I wish to wish the wishiest wish that ever wished a wish that could wish a wish that wished!

 

115407272021

The wishy wish turns out to be wishy washy

i wish for better knowledge

Granted. No corruption to it. A noble wish sir.

i wish my allergies would relax.

125607272021

Granted. They relax drinking chardonnay in your glands causing excessive reactions to everything.

 

I wish I had a noble wish.

Granted. You are a noble. Here's your invitation to the Nero's palace.

I hope you enjoy the cithara music.

Granted, I enjoyed it while Rome burned and you stand next to me.

 

I wished that your wish was more wish and less statement of hope.

granted! but you wished for something horrible just for a short moment of escape.

i wish flat earthers and anti vaxxers didn't exist.
